titles.title: HP638 Ere I sleep, for every favour

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Ere I sleep, for every favour
This day showed
By my God,
I will bless my Saviour.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
O my Lord, what shall I render
To thy name,
Still the same,
Gracious, good, and tender?

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Thou hast ordered all my goings
In thy way,
Heard me pray,
Sanctified my doings.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Visit me with thy salvation;
Let thy care
Now be near
Round my habitation.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Leave me not, but ever love me;
Let thy peace
Be my bliss,
Till thou hence remove me.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Thou my rock, my guard, my tower,
Safely keep,
While I sleep,
Me, with all thy power.

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
So, whene'er in death I slumber,
Let me rise
With the wise,
Counted in their number.
